About.description: I enjoy programming and building web applications with React, Node.js and MongoDB. I like learning new things, exploring different technologies and improving with every project.

Tools.description: These are the tools and technologies I use most. I enjoy learning new ones and improving how I work on every project.

Education.description: I have gained valuable experience in IT, where I apply my knowledge in practice, improve my technical skills, and contribute to solving real-world problems.
